text: z Emails to mailing list and stakeholders, including residents, consultees, and councillors. z Public events: – 3 webinars; – 2 online drop-in sessions; – 2 in-person drop-in sessions; and – In-person public engagement sessions. BACK TO CONTENTS z Flyers and posters at Idea Stores and libraries; flyers handed out on streets. 5.3 Following the early engagement, consultation in accordance with Regulation 18 of the Town and Country (Local Planning) (England) Regulations 2012, was undertaken for a six week period from 6th November to 18th December 2023. The purpose of the Regulation 18 consultation was to gain feedback on the new draft policies, including their suitability and potential impacts. This engagement process included: z Digital engagement methods: – A dedicated webpage in the council’s consultation portal; – A mapping and survey system called StoryMaps; – Online drop-in and webinar events.
